SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.clientonserver

Interface Client

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRMI, ClientSocket
public interface Client
This object is used to send updates to a specific client, it resides on the server. ClientRMI and ClientTCP implement methods properly.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    disconnect()
    This function is used to close the connection with the client
    void
    endGame(List<PlayerWithPoints> leaderBoard)
    This method is used at the end of the game to send the leaderboard to the client.
    void
    gameStarted(boolean newMatch)
    This method is used when the lobby is ready and the admin started the game.
    String
    getPlayerName()
    This method is used to return the name of the players using this client.
    void
    pickedFromBoard(org.json.simple.JSONObject position)
    This method is used when a player picks a tile from the board.
    String
    ping()
    This function is used to ensure the client is still connected.
    void
    postChatMessage(String sender, String message)
    This method is used to send a chat message to clients.
    void
    putIntoShelf(String player, int column, Tile tile)
    This method is used when a player inserts a single tile into his shelf.
    void
    refreshBoard(org.json.simple.JSONObject board)
    This method is used to transfer the whole board to the remote view, it uses a json string.
    void
    refreshChat(Chat chat)
    This method is used to send the whole chat to the client, it is used when a refresh is needed.
    void
    refreshCommonGoal(int id, List<Integer> points)
    This method is used when a player achieves a common goal and pops points from its stack.
    void
    refreshShelf(String player, org.json.simple.JSONObject shelf)
    This method is used to transfer the whole shelf of a player to the remote view of the client, it uses a json string.
    void
    setExceptionHandler(NetworkExceptionHandler e)
    This function is used to set the ExceptionHandler the client will notify when a network exception happens.
    void
    setPlayerGoal(int id)
    This method is used at the beginning of the game to let the client know its personal goal
    void
    updateTurn(String player)
    This function is used when the turn of a player ends.

  • Method Details

    • getPlayerName

      String getPlayerName()
      This method is used to return the name of the players using this client.
      Returns:
      String, player's name.

    • setExceptionHandler

      void setExceptionHandler(NetworkExceptionHandler e)
      This function is used to set the ExceptionHandler the client will notify when a network exception happens.
      Parameters:
      e - Exception handler

    • pickedFromBoard

      void pickedFromBoard(org.json.simple.JSONObject position)
      This method is used when a player picks a tile from the board. It sends the message to the remote view to remove the tile from the board.
      Parameters:
      position - position

    • refreshBoard

      void refreshBoard(org.json.simple.JSONObject board)
      This method is used to transfer the whole board to the remote view, it uses a json string.
      Parameters:
      board - JSONObject

    • putIntoShelf

      void putIntoShelf(String player, int column, Tile tile)
      This method is used when a player inserts a single tile into his shelf. It is used to send the message to the remote view of the client in order to insert the tile into the shelf.
      Parameters:
      player - String name of the player that moved the tile
      column - destination column of the shelf
      tile - Tile to insert

    • refreshShelf

      void refreshShelf(String player, org.json.simple.JSONObject shelf)
      This method is used to transfer the whole shelf of a player to the remote view of the client, it uses a json string.
      Parameters:
      player - name of the player
      shelf - JSONObject

    • postChatMessage

      void postChatMessage(String sender, String message)
      This method is used to send a chat message to clients.
      Parameters:
      sender - Player's name
      message - String message

    • refreshChat

      void refreshChat(Chat chat)
      This method is used to send the whole chat to the client, it is used when a refresh is needed.
      Parameters:
      chat - Chat object

    • gameStarted

      void gameStarted(boolean newMatch)
      This method is used when the lobby is ready and the admin started the game.
      Parameters:
      newMatch - true if the game is new, false if it was loaded from a save or the player reconnected.

    • updateTurn

      void updateTurn(String player)
      This function is used when the turn of a player ends.
      Parameters:
      player - Name of the player that will play next.

    • refreshCommonGoal

      void refreshCommonGoal(int id, List<Integer> points)
      This method is used when a player achieves a common goal and pops points from its stack. It is also used to init the common goal.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the common goal
      points - Copy of the stack with points that can still be achieved

    • setPlayerGoal

      void setPlayerGoal(int id)
      This method is used at the beginning of the game to let the client know its personal goal
      Parameters:
      id - Int ID of the goal

    • endGame

      void endGame(List<PlayerWithPoints> leaderBoard)
      This method is used at the end of the game to send the leaderboard to the client.
      Parameters:
      leaderBoard - Map: player's name - points

    • disconnect

      void disconnect()
      This function is used to close the connection with the client

    • ping

      String ping()
      This function is used to ensure the client is still connected. Expected return value is "pong".
